channel.title: Posts on Gabe's retirement musings
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Gabe's retirement musings

item.title: Some of my favorite Swims
item.description: I learned how to swim almost 50 years ago and swimming has been my constant companion and escape since then. Here are some of my favorite swims from over the years: Lacul Cernica Bucuresti - I used to swim this one once in a while back in the 80s - it was a little harder to get to with a bus and then a 4-5 km walk over some fields so we would usually make a day of it.
